name: Netradyne
description: Netradyne provides AI-powered fleet safety solutions to enhance driver behavior and optimize commercial vehicle operations.
longDescription: Netradyne is a SaaS provider specializing in AI-driven fleet safety and video telematics solutions, founded in 2015 to transform road safety. Its flagship product, Driver•i, leverages advanced computer vision, machine learning, and edge computing to analyze driving behavior in real-time. The platform aims to reduce accidents by detecting risky behaviors like distracted driving or tailgating, while promoting positive driving through gamified rewards. Serving industries like logistics, construction, and transportation, Netradyne supports over 3,000 customers globally, helping fleets improve safety, compliance, and efficiency. The company’s mission is to create safer roads and more profitable operations by empowering drivers and fleet managers with actionable data and coaching tools.
features: Driver•i analyzes 100% of driving time with up to 99% accuracy, identifying risky and safe driving behaviors to improve safety.
In-cab audio alerts instantly notify drivers of distractions or unsafe actions, enabling real-time behavior correction.
The GreenZone Score provides transparent, gamified driver performance metrics to foster a culture of continuous improvement.
High-definition inward and outward cameras capture comprehensive driving data, protecting drivers from false claims.
Advanced fleet management tools integrate safety and compliance data into a single platform, streamlining operations.
Driver self-coaching tools empower drivers to review their performance and improve without manager intervention.
The platform supports global connectivity with external cellular modules, ensuring reliable data transmission.
Optional Driver Monitoring System (DMS) sensors enhance detection of drowsy driving, boosting safety.
Automated leaderboards and DriverStars rewards incentivize safe driving, increasing driver retention.
Data analytics provide insights into road conditions, traffic patterns, and risk areas, optimizing fleet performance.

faqs.question: What is the purpose of Netradyne’s Driver•i system?
faqs.answer: Driver•i is an AI-powered fleet safety camera system that analyzes driving behavior to reduce accidents and improve driver performance.

faqs.question: How does Netradyne ensure driver privacy?
faqs.answer: Netradyne uses facial recognition only for driver authentication via its Visual Login System, with clear privacy policies outlined at https://netradyne.com/biometric-data-privacy-policy/.

faqs.question: Which industries does Netradyne serve?
faqs.answer: Netradyne supports industries like trucking, logistics, construction, food and beverage, oil and gas, and passenger transit.

faqs.question: Can Netradyne’s system integrate with existing fleet management tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, Driver•i integrates seamlessly with existing fleet management systems, offering comprehensive reporting and analytics.

faqs.question: How does the GreenZone Score work?
faqs.answer: The GreenZone Score transparently tracks driver performance, rewarding safe driving with gamified elements like automated leaderboards and DriverStars.

faqs.question: Does Netradyne offer customer support for its products?
faqs.answer: Netradyne provides 24/7 support for technical issues and product inquiries via email at support@netradyne.com or phone at 1 (833) 476-9663.

faqs.question: How accurate is Netradyne’s AI in detecting driving behaviors?
faqs.answer: The Driver•i system achieves up to 99% accuracy in identifying both risky and positive driving behaviors, backed by over 18 billion vision-analyzed driving miles.

faqs.question: Is Netradyne’s solution available globally?
faqs.answer: Yes, Netradyne serves customers in the US, Canada, Mexico, Germany, the UK, Australia, New Zealand, India, with plans for further expansion.
